titlestmt.titleproper: UCLA Department of Special Collections Lectures Audio Recordings
Finding Aid for the UCLA Department of Special Collections Lectures Audio Recordings LSC.2283
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Kelly Besser, 2021.

p.date: Online finding aid last updated 2021 January 8.

address.addressline: Room A1713, Charles E. Young Research Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-01-08 15:25:52 -0800.

did.unittitle: UCLA Department of Special Collections lectures audio recordings

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Unprocessed collection. Material is unavailable for access. Please contact Special Collections reference (spec-coll@library.ucla.edu) for more information.

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
phystech.p: CONTAINS UNPROCESSED AUDIO MATERIALS: Audio materials are not currently available for access and will require further processing and assessment. If you have questions about this material please email spec-coll@library.ucla.edu.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of four audio cassette recordings representing lectures sponsored and held by the UCLA Library Department of Special Collections. Includes lectures by Sandra Tsing Loh (2001) and Mark Salzman (2005), and two Bonie Cashin Lectures presented by Judith Freedman (2004) and Barbara Hodgson (2005).
